turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice to hear from you, what will it be today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a large mocha Frappuccino from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order large mocha frappacino ok, so that will be a venti size from starbucks right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you want in your drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me repeat that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 1 order of venti mocha frappacino with no additional flavoring is that your final order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok which store you would like to pick up from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Going on to Cass Avenue and Darien.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
